description: SEC charges major cryptocurrency exchange with operating as unregistered securities exchange, broker, and clearing agency. Civil penalties expected to exceed $100M.
MiCA Phase 2 implementation deadline approaches. Crypto asset service providers must complete licensing applications by March 2026 or cease EU operations.
Treasury Department adds three DeFi protocol addresses to SDN list citing North Korean cyber laundering connections.
UK Financial Conduct Authority issues updated guidance on crypto promotions. Firms given 90-day compliance window for new disclosure requirements.
CFTC opens investigation into alleged market manipulation on three perpetual futures platforms operating without proper registration.
Monetary Authority of Singapore revokes license of crypto payment service provider for AML compliance failures. First revocation under Payment Services Act.
SFC approves two additional virtual asset trading platform licenses under new regulatory framework. Total licensed platforms now at seven.
FATF publishes updated guidance on travel rule implementation for virtual asset service providers. Recommends lowering threshold to $500.
Department of Justice announces guilty plea from former DeFi protocol developer for wire fraud conspiracy. Sentencing scheduled for April 2026.
Japan Financial Services Agency proposes new stablecoin regulation framework requiring bank-grade reserves and quarterly audits.
ASIC issues information sheet on crypto asset classification. Clarifies which tokens qualify as financial products under Corporations Act.
Financial Services Commission mandates real-name verification for all crypto-to-crypto transfers effective Q3 2026. Exchanges given 6-month implementation window.
